forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this evening, becoming all snow overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow overnight. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low -2C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low near 30F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a few snow showers in the morning. High 1C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High 37F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low around -5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 26F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will become lighter overnight. Low around 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will taper off to light snow overnight. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Rain and snow showers in the morning. A few rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few snow showers during the afternoon. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few snow showers during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
